Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Unit
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Monster, Player, Villager

    public abstract class Unit
extends Entity
    The class for the characters in the game. It handles damage, stats, death etc.
    Author:
    Mubashwer Salman Khurshid (mskh, 601738)

      • update

        public boolean update(World world,
                      int delta,
                      float xDir,
                      float yDir,
                      float xPosNew,
                      float yPosNew)
        Moves player if path is not blocked.
        Parameters:
        world - It represents the entire game where the player exists.
        xDir - The 's movement in the x axis (-1, 0 or 1).
        yDir - The 's movement in the y axis (-1, 0 or 1).
        delta - Time passed since last frame (milliseconds).
        xPosNew - New x-coordinate of unit in map.
        yPosNew - New y-coordinate of unit in map.
        Returns:
        True if player has moved.
